column3: I strongly support this regulation as it will provide much-needed protection for consumer data privacy. The provisions are comprehensive and well-thought-out.
While I appreciate the intent behind this legislation, I'm concerned about the implementation timeline. Small businesses need more time to comply with these requirements.
This is an excellent initiative that aligns with international best practices. I particularly appreciate the clear definitions and scope provided in the draft.
The compliance costs outlined in this section seem excessive for startups and SMEs. Consider providing tiered compliance requirements based on company size.
I suggest adding more specific guidance on cross-border data transfer mechanisms. The current language is too vague and may lead to interpretation issues.
Thank you for providing this opportunity for public consultation. The transparent approach to policy making is commendable and should be continued.
The penalties mentioned in this section are appropriate and necessary to ensure organizations take data protection seriously. Strong enforcement is crucial.
I'm confused about the relationship between this regulation and existing privacy laws. More clarity is needed on how they will interact.
This regulation will significantly impact our industry operations. We need more consultation with affected stakeholders before finalizing these provisions.
The proposed framework is comprehensive but may benefit from clearer implementation guidelines and practical examples for better understanding.
I fully endorse the privacy-by-design approach outlined in this section. It reflects modern data protection principles and global standards.
The notification requirements seem burdensome for smaller organizations. Consider streamlining the process while maintaining transparency.
This initiative demonstrates the government's commitment to protecting citizen privacy rights. The public interest is clearly prioritized.
The technical requirements in this section need more detailed specifications. Current descriptions are too high-level for practical implementation.
I appreciate the balanced approach between privacy protection and business innovation. The regulation strikes a good balance.
